OffenceType.name: Traffic Violation
OffenceType.description: Violations related to moving vehicles and traffic rules.

OffenceType.name: Parking Violation
OffenceType.description: Offences related to improper parking of vehicles.

OffenceType.name: Documentation Violation
OffenceType.description: Offences related to missing or invalid vehicle/driver documents.

OffenceType.name: Vehicle Condition Violation
OffenceType.description: Violations concerning the roadworthiness and condition of the vehicle.

OffenceType.name: Public Nuisance Violation
OffenceType.description: Offences that cause public inconvenience or nuisance.

OffenceType.name: Commercial Vehicle Violation
OffenceType.description: Specific violations applicable only to commercial vehicles.

OffenceType.name: Environmental Violation
OffenceType.description: Violations related to vehicle emissions and noise.

OffenceType.name: Rider/Driver Safety Violation
OffenceType.description: Offences related to the personal safety of the driver or rider.

OffenceType.name: Road Safety Violation
OffenceType.description: Violations that endanger other road users.

OffenceType.name: Licensing & Permit Violation
OffenceType.description: Violations related to permits and licensing for special vehicle use.
